meaning_str.bing:
n. 地图
v. 绘制…的地图；了解信息
abbr. 〈美(=Military Aid Program)军事援助计划
网络. 电子地图；映射；平均动脉压(mean arterial pressure)

电子地图；映射；平均动脉压(mean arterial pressure)

地图；图像；（基因）图谱；（基因）图；分布图；方位图；剖面图；[数]映象；脸部轮廓；脸；面孔
描绘；映射；绘制地图；[生]（基因）被安置；将（基因）置入染色体的特定序列；把…与…相联系；[数]使变换；映射；详细安排；筹划；了解信息；提供信息

1.en: The general stared at the battle map with his wise and farsighted eyes.
1.cn: 将军用睿智的目光注视着作战地图。

2.en: Put a box or basket with snacks, bottled water, books, and a local map in an easy-to-find place.
2.cn: 在容易看见的地方放上一个装有小吃，瓶装水，书和当地地图的盒子或篮子。

3.en: The release of the map marks a new phase of the mission for the spacecraft, which will now orbit the sun's innermost planet for a year.
3.cn: 这份地图的发布标志这个航天器的任务的新阶段，它现在将环绕这个太阳最里面的行星飞行一年。

0.en: See, every known map registers it as empty desert.
0.cn: 所有已知地图上那里都是沙漠。

1.en: Would anyone like to do the map reading? I will. Are you sure, Daddy Pig? I'm very good at map reading. Oh, this map is a bit difficult.
1.cn: 有人能来帮忙看看地图吗？我来。你确定吗猪爸爸？看地图我可是很在行的，噢...这张地图好像有点难懂啊。

2.en: Look, look, I don't work here. It's not like I have a map of this place. A map! Good idea. You take me to the map, I figure out where my parents are. Oh boy.
2.cn: 听我说，我不是工作人员，也没有这里的地图。地图！好主意。你带我去找地图，我就能弄清楚我爸妈在哪，赞。

3.en: This is the map that shows us where we're going. And this is the map that shows us where we've been. And it's never ever ugly.
3.cn: 这张地图会为我们指引方向。而这张地图标记着我们去过的地方。它绝对不是丑陋的。

4.en: I'll map-read and Mummy Pig will drive. Are you sure, Daddy Pig? When you map-read, We always get lost and you get grumpy.
4.cn: 我来负责看地图，而妈妈负责开车。你确定吗，猪爸爸，你看地图我们会迷路的，你会变很焦躁。

5.en: Is Daddy Pig doing the map-reading? Yes, Daddy Pig is doing the map-reading. And he's a bit grumpy at the moment. I am not grumpy.
5.cn: 猪爸爸他是不是在看地图呀？是的，猪爸爸在看地图，他现在非常地焦躁呢。我没有焦躁。

6.en: You are my map. Let's go. Lead on, my map. Show me where we're going.
6.cn: 你就是我的地图，出发吧，你带路，活地图，告诉我咱们现在去哪。

7.en: Mummy pig can drive, and I'll do the map reading. Are you sure, Daddy pig? We always get lost when you do the map reading. We won't get lost.
7.cn: 猪妈妈你开车。我来帮大家看地图。你确定吗，猪妈妈？每次你只要看地图，我们就会迷路。我们这次不会迷路了。

8.en: The map to Skywalker. We know you found it. And now you're going to give it to the First Order.
8.cn: 天行者所在位置的地图，我们知道在你身上，现在你要将这份地图上交给第一秩序。

9.en: A map. To Skywalker himself? You are right back in the mess.
9.cn: 一张能找到天行者的地图？你是打算重出江湖了。

10.en: Anthony's not told me too much about the trip. Hmm, a map.
10.cn: 安东尼没告诉我太多这次旅途的细节。看啊，一张地图。

11.en: Shut up. I solved it. Those are map coordinates. Got them. Let's go.
11.cn: 闭嘴，我解出来了，这些是地图坐标。知道了，走。

12.en: There's no side tunnels, no maintenance tunnels. Nothing on any map. Nothing.
12.cn: 没有支线，没有维修道，地图上什么都没有。

13.en: So what we did was map out the entire room to identify every squeak.
13.cn: 我们给整间房做了地图标记，确定了所有吱吱声的所在。

14.en: It's an old map. A speed. Poor dear didn't even know what it was.
14.cn: 只不过是一张老地图，一个罗盘，那老家伙都不知道那是什么。

15.en: Well, I was trying to figure out how to get to Buckingham Palace, right? So, I'm in my map and... Hey.
15.cn: 我想去白金汉宫就进入地图，然后…

16.en: It is very doubtful that R2 would have the rest of the map in his backup data.
16.cn: 谁都不能肯定R2的备份数据里有剩余的地图信息。

17.en: Who else knows of this map? No one, but Byamba, myself, and its creator.
17.cn: 还有谁知道这幅地图？就只有宾巴，我，还有此图的绘制者。

18.en: Every ship has one. A what? A map. What does that say? Tribal Territory.
18.cn: 所有船都有一张。什么？一张地图。上面说什么？“野人领地”。

19.en: Daddy, are we nearly there? The map says, Rebecca's house is on the next hill.
19.cn: 爸爸我们快到了吗？地图显示瑞贝卡的家就在下一个山坡上。
